name: Yojigen Shoujo Lydia
overview: The mystery of the Bermuda Triangle has never been solved in a satisfactory way. A science object team is sent to investigate the strange occurrences. A time slip opens the way to another dimension, and the protagonist is dispatched to explore it, whatever dangers may await him there. Yojigen Shōjo Lydia is a text adventure game with graphics. Locations are represented as still screens; navigation and interaction with the environment is done by inputting text commands. Some of the locations in the game have pseudo-3D graphics; 3D glasses are supplied with the game for additional effects. The game contains some erotic images.
